sentences.sentence: Kabuki and Noh in Japan as the most representative one of the traditional operas.
sentences.translation: 歌舞伎和能剧一样是日本最有代表性的传统戏曲之一。

sentences.sentence: So they named the company after a great ape, an endangered species that's pronounced bo-NOH-bos, not BON-oh-bos.
sentences.translation: 因此，他们将企业以一种濒临绝种的猩猩的名字命名，读起来是bo - NOH - bos，而不是BON - oh - bos。

sentences.sentence: This is when he branched out into Japanese Noh-plays (“Curlew River”) and Shakespearean drama (“A Midsummer Night’s Dream”).
sentences.translation: 这段时间里，他创作的《麻鹬河》借鉴了日本能剧，而《仲夏夜之梦》借用了莎士比亚戏剧。
